channel.title: Posts on Widescreen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Widescreen

item.title: airfeed_presentation
item.description: Aaron Stephenson gives a great talk at the Sydney Video Technology meetup on his new tvOS app Airfeed. It’s not quite what you’d call a broadcast grade recording (h/t to @mattdelves either way!) but definitely worth checking out. Go tv!

item.title: tvos browser
item.description: Really interesting post over at MacRumors about running a browser on tvOS. I’m not so sure how nice the UX would be but it’s great to see people pushing the boundaries on the tv.

item.title: Hello Television
item.description: Thought you couldn’t write a tvOS app because you didn’t know how to write Swift and native iOS code? Think again. Really incredible stuff happening over at @2metres’ repo on the tvOS/TVML/Node server front. Write a whole app without harming a single line of Swift code. Check it out!
